flavor: "Saved my bacon more than once, but gives a wicked sense of déjà vu." -Whizzard
printed_text:
[interrupt] → [trash]: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
stripped_printed_text: Interrupt -> trash: Reduce the base trace strength of a trace to 0. Errata from CR 1.4

printed_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: "They're mindless tools of destruction, good for little else. Nice guys, though. Some of my best friends are scrubbers." -Ji "Noise" Reilly
printed_text: 2[recurring-credit] (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits (When you install this card and before your turn begins, refill to 2 hosted credits.) You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs.

printed_text: +1[mu] Once per turn, you may immediately make another run when a successful run ends. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Once per turn, you may immediately make another run when a successful run ends. Limit 1 console per player.

printed_text: [trash]: Derez 1 piece of ice you fully broke during this encounter.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Derez 1 piece of ice you fully broke during this encounter.

printed_text: Interface → [trash]: Break any number of AP subroutines. [interrupt] → [trash]: Prevent any amount of net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> trash: Break any number of AP subroutines. Interrupt -> trash: Prevent any amount of net damage.

flavor: "I don't care what the studies show. From my experience, I can ingest three cans of Diesel an hour for up to twelve hours before going into cardiac arrest." -heard during the eleventh hour
printed_text: [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click].
stripped_printed_text: click, trash: Gain click click.

flavor: Few corporate employees have such wide-sweeping security clearance as the janitorial staff. Most corps foolishly think they're too dim-witted to take advantage of it.
printed_text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to install hardware.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to install hardware.

flavor: "My boss rewards quality work. If you know what's good for you, you'll keep it up."
printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1[credit] if you have at least 2[link].
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 1 credit if you have at least 2 link.

flavor: Green-two clearance is the highest level of security a corp can gain access to. Legally, anyway.
printed_text: Gain 3[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 3 credits and draw 1 card.

printed_text:
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able.

flavor:
so very still, even
cherry blossoms are not stirred
by the temple bell
-Fuhaku
printed_text:
2[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to rez ice.
stripped_printed_text: 2 recurring credits Use these credits to rez ice.

printed_text: [subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[credit], 1[credit] or 2[credit]. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, move Bullfrog so that it is the outermost piece of ice protecting another server (the Runner continues the run from this new position and is now running on this new server).
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine You and the Runner secretly spend 0 credits, 1 credit or 2 credits. Reveal spent credits. If you and the Runner spent a different number of credits, move Bullfrog so that it is the outermost piece of ice protecting another server (the Runner continues the run from this new position and is now running on this new server).

flavor: Where one thing ends, another begins.
printed_text:
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 4</trace> If successful, end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, the Runner cannot make another run this turn. Subroutine Trace 4 If successful, end the run.

flavor: This is the net. We work here. We're cops.
printed_text:
X[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during traces. X is the number of links the Runner has.
stripped_printed_text: X recurring credits Use these credits during traces. X is the number of links the Runner has.

printed_text:
1[recurring-credit]
Use this credit to advance ice.
stripped_printed_text: 1 recurring credit Use this credit to advance ice.

flavor: It's really hard to lose a government contract.
printed_text: [click], [click]: Gain 4[credit].
stripped_printed_text: click, click: Gain 4 credits.

printed_text: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each advancement token on it.
stripped_printed_text: Tyrant can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "Subroutine End the run." for each advancement token on it.

printed_text: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."
stripped_printed_text: Rez a piece of ice, ignoring all costs, and install Oversight AI on that ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Trash host ice if all its subroutines are broken during a single encounter."

flavor: It didn't look like the headquarters of a multi-billion cred company. Probably because it wasn't.
printed_text: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more [click] remaining, they lose [click][click].
stripped_printed_text: Forfeit this agenda: If the Runner has 2 or more click remaining, they lose click click.
